The file 'Matrix.csv' contains test scenarios and expectations for a generator that generates and executes test cases 
for N4JS's access control modifiers. The file 'Matrix.pdf' is simply a PDF rendition of the original table, which is
available at the following URL:

https://docs.google.com/a/numberfour.eu/spreadsheets/d/1u8c61A3bqqApD6pd8u8XRAdMbTvEUFOtJLkCgtn0JbE/edit?usp=sharing

Please see the JavaDoc of class AccessControlTest for more information about the intent and the format of these files.
For an explanation of the different test expectations (y, n, u, y?, n?, u?, #), please see the JavaDoc of class
Expectation.
